main.name: Keshav Jha
main.bio: Hi there! I am Keshav!. I am an undergraduate student pursuing my bachelor's in Computer Science from sathyabama institute of science and technology, Chennai, India. I've been coding for over 2 years now. I've worked both on personal as well as open source projects and built some amazing things. I like solving problems with code, contribute to open source projects, and share my knowledge with others by writing technical blogs on topics related to the web and android development.

education.school: Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology

work.title: Open source contributer
work.description: Designed and devloped the frontend of a online job portal with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: Opportunity Tracker (React JS, NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDB)
Memestream (React JS, MaterialUI, NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDB)
